Unusual deaths recur on a large scale.
According to statistics, up to now, more than 1,900 hectares of
Cu farming area of ​​more than 500 households

The work of the animal husbandry

at a number of crab farming households in the locality and
the results show that the crab has a weak dark color,
slow activity and dies after a few
hours to a day.  In particular, dead cuc
appeared in all sizes because the
identification results showed that the pond environment was
bad, polluting the pond bottom at the
time of the survey, with hot weather from 25 to 34 degrees Celsius and
high salinity from 35 to 40 percent.  Thousands of thousands of people change the
water environment, creating conditions for organic matter on the
bottom to grow. Harmful bacteria
develop toxic gases on the bottom, which increases,
affecting the health of the fish.
Authorities say there are currently no

related to the new Regulations on

cigarette management from July 0, direct money transfers
or deposits to e-wallets
over 10 million VND must be biometrically
authenticated, i.e. through facial recognition
or customer fingerprint when transferring.
From 10 million VND or less and the total
amount transferred per day does not exceed
20 million VND, there is no need for
biometric authentication when the total amount reaches
20 million, the next time the person transfers even if it is
only 1 VND.
Transactions must be done with biometrics
before transferring. This regulation is intended to prevent
damage to account holders when fraudsters
